description:
Alphabet's Treasury team consists of strong, creative performers with deep expertise in their respective fields. We contribute to our company's growing global success by dealing with challenging issues and concepts and then applying them to rapidly evolving business models. In Treasury, we provide funding, risk management and mitigation support as well as investment oversight and broad business support.

In this role, you will collaborate with a cross-functional group of Finance, Legal, Product and Engineering teams to help launch new products and services globally for Alphabet. The scope of work will involve performing Treasury due diligence like researching funds flow and entity structure for new products, partnering with Product teams to increase payment capabilities and ensuring Google is on top of changing payment regulations to ensure ongoing compliance.

qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 5 years of experience in a corporate treasury or other finance operations team.
  • Experience in defining and documenting business requirements and processes.

Preferred qualifications:

  • Experience in global Treasury Operations function.
  • Working knowledge of spreadsheet software, SQL, Google Apps Script and VBA.
  • Excellent business acumen and ability to facilitate discussions with senior executives to obtain key decisions.
  • Exceptional analytical and communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Support the development of business requirements for product launches and other projects.
  • Complete ad-hoc compliance requests such as regulatory audits and bank/license requirements for all payment entities.
  • Track and monitor changing payments regulations that impact Google’s billing system and facilitate bank support.
  • Design legal entity and cash flow structure to optimally meet business needs, reduce Treasury risk and increase efficiency.
title: Treasury Analyst
